name: Valiant Knight
description:
Valiant knight is my first game project within Unreal engine 4. I used a course that i paid for to help me create a fun and interesting game. It was a huge help in teaching me more indepth C++, which university didn’t teach me. 

the sort of things you will come across in this game are  idle animations, weapon pick ups and enemies to engage in combat. there is also a secret bit with moving platforms.
